page.title: 11RECREATION AROUND SCHOOL - 1
page.content:
The Purbeck Sports Complex As a shared facility the local community has access to the complex which is part of the Upper School. It was opened in l978 and offers a number of sporting facilities not available previously. There is a swimming pool (25m) used for competitive and leisure swimming with a recent addition of large inflatable toys for childrens water play. There is now a thriving club which caters for the competitive swimmber and arranges classes for the disabled. Included in the complex are four squash courts. This is very popular with an active league in the area.
There is a Youth Club which is part of the centre, and they use the pool for canoeing, life saving, underwater swimming, and canoe-polo.
